wikitext.*:
'''RIP''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "rush, fly, fling".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 384 (root appearing as "RIP-")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[rimpa]]'' ("rushing, flying")<ref name=LR/>
*[[Noldorin]]: ''[[rhib-]]'', ''[[rhimp-]]'', ''rhimmo'' ("to flow like a [?torrent]")<ref name=LR/>

==See also==

*''[[Rhimdath]]''
